channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Project Inheritance Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Project Inheritance Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10407|2024-08-04T22:24:17.569Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20project%20inheritance%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Project Inheritance Plugin 2.0.0 and earlier displayed a list of environment variables passed to a build without masking sensitive variables contributed by the Mask Passwords Plugin.

item.title: CVE-2020-2198|2024-08-04T07:01:41.160Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20project%20inheritance%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Project Inheritance Plugin 19.08.02 and earlier does not redact encrypted secrets in the 'getConfigAsXML' API URL when transmitting job config.xml data to users without Job/Configure.

item.title: CVE-2020-2197|2024-08-04T07:01:41.113Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20project%20inheritance%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Project Inheritance Plugin 19.08.02 and earlier does not require users to have Job/ExtendedRead permission to access Inheritance Project job configurations in XML format.

item.title: CVE-2019-10408|2024-08-04T22:24:16.960Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20project%20inheritance%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Project Inheritance Plugin 2.0.0 and earlier allowed attackers to trigger project generation from templates.

item.title: CVE-2019-10409|2024-08-04T22:24:17.762Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20project%20inheritance%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Project Inheritance Plugin 2.0.0 and earlier allowed attackers with Overall/Read permission to trigger project generation from templates.
